roleset.name: recant or renege on a belief or agreement

example.name: transative example
example.text: The Bush administration has resiled from some international treaties.

example.name: resile from
example.text: I do not resile from a single word I have written about the collapse of the banks.
example.arg: from a single word I have written about the collapse of the banks.

roleset.note: RESILE-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie. (from resile.01-v)

roleset.name: spring back to original shape
roleset.note: RESILE-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie. (from resile.02-v)
